Video Conferencing
Meet and collaborate with colleagues across campus or around the world.









 




 
   




Online solutions


Stanford provides a range of video conferencing services that cater to your unique needs.


Zoom
Zoom provides the best video conferencing experience at Stanford.



Launch Zoom
Learn more about Zoom





WebEx
WebEx is available for groups that require it.

Launch WebEx


Learn more about WebEx
Get support on WebEx









Onsite solutions


Build, upgrade, or rent a video conferencing room system to fit your needs and budget.


Build a Meeting Room
The Build a Meeting Room design service can build or upgrade a room system to fit your needs and budget.
Learn more about Build a Meeting Room


Support a Meeting Room
Enjoy the peace of mind of remote and onsite support for your video conferencing room or presentation room by subscribing to the conference and collaboration room support service.
Learn more about Support a Room


Support an Event
Get technical assistance and equipment to hold a video conference in your own department, or in a University IT (UIT) video-enabled room.
Learn more about Support an Event
